title: The Marlins will energize their stadium this year by telling fans to...
content:
The Marlins will energize their stadium this year by telling fans to bring their instruments. The notice forbids pots and pans, but doesnâ€™t say shit about keytars. The team only wants instrument playing during certain moments, to which I say good luck.
